info.description: This is the backend API for the Dorivo multi-tenant ordering system.
info.title: Dorivo Multi-Tenant API

get.description: Retrieves a list of all saved delivery addresses for the authenticated user.

post.description: Adds a new delivery address to the authenticated user's profile.

delete.description: Deletes a specific address belonging to the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves the full contents of the user's shopping cart, with calculated totals.

post.description: Adds a product with selected options and quantity to the user's shopping cart.
post.summary: Add an item to the cart

500.description: Failed to add item to cart

put.description: Updates the quantity of a specific item in the user's cart.

400.description: Invalid request body or item ID

delete.description: Removes a specific item entirely from the user's shopping cart.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all products that the authenticated user has marked as a favorite.
Retrieves a list of all notifications for the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Marks one or more notifications as read for the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Notification IDs to mark as read
parameters.name: ids

500.description: Failed to mark notifications as read

get.description: Retrieves a list of orders for the authenticated user, filterable by status.

parameters.description: Filter orders by status (e.g., Active, Completed, Cancelled)
parameters.name: status

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to cancel one of their own active orders.

400.description: Invalid order ID or request body

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to leave a rating and comment for one of their own completed orders.
post.summary: Leave a review for an order

parameters.description: Rating and comment for the order
parameters.name: review

400.description: Invalid order ID or request body

409.description: Order is not completed or a review already exists

get.description: Retrieves a list of all saved payment methods for the authenticated user.

post.description: Adds a new payment method to the user's profile using a token from a payment processor.

delete.description: Deletes a specific payment method belonging to the authenticated user.

post.description: Adds a specific product to the authenticated user's list of favorites.

delete.description: Removes a specific product from the authenticated user's list of favorites.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information for the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Updates the profile information for the currently authenticated user.

delete.description: Permanently deletes the account of the currently authenticated user. This action is irreversible.

put.description: Allows an authenticated user to change their password by providing their current password.

get.description: Retrieves the notification preferences for the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Updates the notification preferences for the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Authenticates a super admin and returns a special JWT for platform management.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all tenants on the platform.

post.description: Allows a super admin to create a new tenant on the platform.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a tenant and all of their associated data from the platform.

get.description: Retrieves the public configuration for a specific tenant, such as name, logo, theme, and contact info.

parameters.description: The unique name of the tenant
parameters.name: tenantId

put.description: Allows a tenant admin to update their own store's configuration (e.g., name, theme, contact info).

get.description: Allows a tenant admin to view a list of all customers who have registered with their store.
get.summary: Get all customers for the tenant

get.description: Retrieves key performance statistics for the tenant's store, such as total revenue and orders today.
Allows a tenant admin to view all orders placed for their store, filterable by status.
get.summary: Get all orders for the tenant

parameters.description: Filter orders by status (e.g., Active, Completed, Cancelled)
parameters.name: status

put.description: Allows a tenant admin to update the status of a specific order (e.g., to 'Preparing', 'Completed').

post.description: Allows a tenant admin to create a new product for their store.

put.description: Allows a tenant admin to update the details of an existing product.

delete.description: Allows a tenant admin to delete a product from their store.

get.description: Retrieves a list of frequently asked questions for a specific tenant, optionally filtered by category.

post.description: Authenticates a user for a specific tenant and returns a JWT token.

get.description: Retrieves a list of products for a tenant, with optional filters for category, tags, price, and sorting.

parameters.description: Filter by main category (e.g., Meal, Drink)
parameters.name: category

get.description: Retrieves a list of the most popular products for a tenant, based on sales volume.
Retrieves the main promotional product for a tenant, often used for a large banner.
Retrieves a list of products marked as 'recommended' by the tenant admin.
Retrieves detailed information for a single product, including its customization options.

post.description: Creates a new user account for a specific tenant.

409.description: User with this email already exists

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available tags for a specific tenant, used for building filter UIs.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and a JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
